data(Auto)
summary(Auto)

# Example training/test split
set.seed(1)
train <- sample(1:nrow(Auto), nrow(Auto)/2)
Auto_train <- Auto[train, ]
Auto_test  <- Auto[-train, ]

# Example model
glm_fit <- glm(mpg01 ~ horsepower + weight, data = Auto_train, family = binomial)
summary(glm_fit)

glm_pred <- ifelse(predict(glm_fit, Auto_test, type = "response") > 0.5, 1, 0)
confusionMatrix(as.factor(glm_pred), as.factor(Auto_test$mpg01))
